query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `support_tickets` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `ticketNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('technical', 'billing', 'general', 'feature_request', 'bug_report') NOT NULL,
  `priority` enum('low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `status` enum('open', 'in_progress', 'waiting_customer', 'resolved', 'closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  `category` varchar(100),
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `assignedTo` int,
  `resolvedBy` int,
  `resolvedAt` timestamp,
  `closedAt` timestamp,
  `firstResponseAt` timestamp,
  `responseTime` int,
  `resolutionTime` int,
  `satisfaction` int,
  `tags` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `organization_idx` (`organizationId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `assigned_to_idx` (`assignedTo`),
  INDEX `ticket_number_idx` (`ticketNumber`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2m1ctgqj5uashnj.root --database AS2yc6bjPtUHJmZyFBFARQ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `support_tickets` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `ticketNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('technical', 'billing', 'general', 'feature_request', 'bug_report') NOT NULL,
  `priority` enum('low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `status` enum('open', 'in_progress', 'waiting_customer', 'resolved', 'closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  `category` varchar(100),
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `assignedTo` int,
  `resolvedBy` int,
  `resolvedAt` timestamp,
  `closedAt` timestamp,
  `firstResponseAt` timestamp,
  `responseTime` int,
  `resolutionTime` int,
  `satisfaction` int,
  `tags` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `organization_idx` (`organizationId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `assigned_to_idx` (`assignedTo`),
  INDEX `ticket_number_idx` (`ticketNumber`)
)
